question: Consider the following statements about Archaeopteryx:  1. Archaeopteryx was the earliest and most primitive bird known, when it was found in Germany in late 19th century 2. The discovery of Archaeopteryx put an end to the debate that Birds originated from Dinosaurs or the archosaurian reptiles.  Which among the above statements is / are correct?
explanation: Archaeopteryx is type of bird-like dinosaurs that is transitional between non-avian feathered dinosaurs and modern birds. It is considered as the oldest known bird of the member of the group Avialae. It used to live in the Late Jurassic around 150 million years ago. Scientists claimed that it is capable of flying, but differently from that of modern birds.
